Title: Apple
Description: Apples are a common Food that can be eaten either raw Roasted or in a Stew. When chopped one apple produces four apple slices. If the hunger value of these four cores is added together the apple grants the most hunger satisfaction (slightly under two full bars) of any raw ingredient. It is important to note that the apple ``must`` be sliced. A full apple does not satisfy as much hunger as four slices despite the rational assumption that it would.

Title: Arrow
Description: Arrows are retrievable ammo for Bows. They can be crafted by combining an Arrow Shaft with an Arrow head and a Feather. Special variants can be commonly found in around the world map. Arrow Heads can be crafted at the Smithy and damage is mostly dependent on metal type. Red Feathers cause the arrows to have more stable flight and potentially more damage compared to Blue Feathers.

Title: Arrow Shaft
Description: An Arrow Shaft is a long thin stick used in a preparation and crafting of Arrows.

Title: Backpack
Description: Backpacks are items that expand a player's carrying capacity.

Title: Blacksmith Mould
Description: Blacksmith Moulds are items that can be attached to the Smithy in order to allow players to form Ingots into a desired shape. These moulds are useful for crafting Weapons Tools and the attachments that go along with them. As of 0.0.21.0 it is impossible to craft Handles or Armor. Therefore there are no moulds that depict them.

Title: Bone
Description: Bones are resources in A Township Tale.

Title: Bowl
Description: A Bowl is a Container with which to hold liquid in.

Title: Bucket
Description: A Bucket is a Container with which to hold liquid in.

Title: Cauldron
Description: Cauldrons serve as a Container to be used for Stewing.

Title: Coal
Description: Coal is the longest lasting Fuel in the game.

Title: Coin
Description: Coins are golden cylinders with an image on either side.

Title: Crystal Shard
Description: Crystal Shards are sharp pieces of crystal from crystal veins.

Title: Dice
Description: Dice (singular: Die) are Items in A Township Tale.

Title: Dried Grass
Description: Dried Grass is a Flammable item in the game and is almost quintessential for the survival of Players when they first join.

Title: Dynamite
Description: Dynamite is a means of Unlocking new areas in the town. It is obtained in Cave Structures in the Mines and is utilized to destroy large boulders blocking paths around the town.

Title: Eggplant
Description: Eggplants are a common that can be eaten either raw Roasted or in a Stew.

Title: Feather
Description: Feathers are a resource in A Township Tale.

Title: Flint
Description: Flint is a common resource with a black rough appearance.

Title: Geode
Description: Geodes are a resource within A Township Tale.

Title: Gourd
Description: Gourds are a type of Item.

Title: Handle
Description: Handles are recipes required to produce Tools and Weapons.

Title: Ingot
Description: An Ingot is a common resource. Every ingot is made up of a particular type of Metal.

Title: Fabric Roll
Description: The Fabric Roll is a generic crafting item added in 0.0.45.0 and is used in the creation of many items including but not limited to Backpacks and Side Pockets.

Title: Ladle
Description: A Ladle is a Container with which to hold liquid.

Title: Lantern
Description: Lanterns are a form of light source and serve as an alternative to Torches and Stakes.

Title: Map Board
Description: A Map Board is an object that can be found in many different locations around the Overworld the most noticeable being one placed on the Respawn Structure.
0.0.46.0 was a pre-Alpha update added to "A Township Tale" on November 26th 2019 and is expected to be the final update for the 2019 calendar year.

Title: Mushroom
Description: Mushrooms are a common source of Food in A Township Tale.

Title: Page
Description: Pages are an uncommon resource that provide information to a player on how to do various activities. These include Cooking Archery Woodcutting Carpentry and Smelting

Title: Quiver
Description: The Quiver is an item that holds arrows for Rangers. The Quiver can only be placed in the far left or far right belt slots which is to probably to prevent players from hitting sensitive areas during heated battles. Quivers raise the arrows so they are easier to grab. They often spawn as loot in all levels of the mines.

Title: Sandstone
Description: Sandstone is a common resource.

Title: Shield
Description: Shields can be used to directly defend against attacks instead of relying upon Armour's specific bodily points of defense.

Title: Side Pocket
Description: The Side Pocket is a Backpack attachment that was introduced in 0.0.45.2.

Title: Spotlight
Description: The Spotlight is a form of fueled light source that serves as an alternative to Torches and Lanterns.

Title: Spriggull Drumstick
Description: A Spriggull Drumstick is a Food Item in A Township Tale. It is a Drumstick resembling that of an ordinary chicken the difference being its blue colour and its abnormal size.

Title: Stick
Description: Sticks are a common resource.

Title: Stone
Description: Stone is a common resource found scattered around Town.

Title: Tomato
Description: Tomatos are a common Food that can be Eaten either raw Roasted or in a Stew.

Title: Tool
Description: Tools are Items used for Crafting and obtaining Resources. Most Tools are Crafted with Handles and Tool Heads though few are individual Items themselves.

Title: Tool Hook
Description: The Tool Hook is a Backpack attachment that was introduced in 0.0.45.0.

Title: Torch
Description: A Torch is an item that provides light in A Township Tale

Title: Weapon
Description: Weapons are Tools used in Combat to damage Creatures or other Players.

Title: Wood
Description: Wood is a common resource used to craft a variety of tool handles in addition to being the most readily available source of fuel.

Title: Wooden Bag
Description: The Wooden Bag was added in 0.0.46.0 as a for people just beginning their adventures in the Township.

Title: Wooden Stake
Description: The Wooden Stake is an item added in the pre-Alpha 0.0.9.0 update.

Title: Wyrm Leg
Description: Wyrm Legs are floppy scythes dropped from Wyrms and may be used as makeshift sickles. They have since been removed from the game due to issues when docking.
